opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Bush v. Singletary, Secretary, Florida Department of Corrections, Ante, P. 1065

opinion:
510 U.S. 1173

Bush
v.
Singletary, Secretary, Florida Department of Corrections, ante, p. 1065.

No. 93-6431.

Supreme Court of United States.

February 28, 1994.

Petition for rehearing denied.

JUSTICE BLACKMUN, dissenting.

1

I would call for a response in each of these cases with a view to granting the petitions for certiorari. See my dissent in Callins v. Collins, ante, p. 1143.
